weekly picks (Dec 1 week 2023)

Posted on December 4, 2023 in 2023dec,  Daily t.me,  adsabs,  g scholar

A WordCloud of 2023 Dec 1st week collection

  1. PhysRevX.13.041040 A Postquantum Theory of Classical Gravity? (PRX)

  2. 203 Might There Be No Quantum Gravity After All? (Physics)

  3. PhysRevLett.131.236301 Phonon Hall Viscosity of Ionic Crystals (AHMacDonald, PRL)

  4. PhysRevLett.131.236601 Connecting the Many-Body Chern Number to Luttinger’s Theorem through Steda’s Formula (PRL)

  5. PhysRevLett.131.230401 Large Deviations beyond the Kibble-Zurek Mechanism (PRL)

  6. 2312.01439 Absence of Fermi surface reconstruction in pressure-driven overdoped YBCO (arXiv)

  7. 2312.01108 Identifying Majorana Zero Modes in Vortex Lattices Using Fano Factor Tomography (JHu, arXiv)

  8. 2312.01967 Kitaev-Heisenberg model on the star lattice – from chiral Majoranas to chiral triplons (arXiv)

  9. 2312.01542 Anisotropic skyrmion crystal on a centrosymmetric square lattice under an in-plane magnetic field (Hayami, arXiv)

  10. 2312.01491 Flat band projections: Sign problem mapping for frustrated spin systems (arXiv)

  11. 2312.01461 Spin-fluctuation heat capacity at magnetic phase transition in the Co,Fe doped MnSi (MnSi, arXiv)

  12. 2312.00877 Effective field theory of Berry Landau Fermi liquid from the coadjoint orbit method (arXiv)

  13. 2312.00868 Modular extension of topological orders from congruence representations (arXiv)

  14. 2312.01913 Tunable exciton polaritons in band-gap engineered hexagonal boron nitride (arXiv)

  15. 2312.01820 Electrically tunable flat bands with layer-resolved charge distribution in twisted monolayer-bilayer graphene (arXiv)

  16. 2312.01553 Emergent electric field induced by current-driven domain wall motion in a room-temperature antiferromagnet FeSn2 (arXiv)

  17. 2312.01041 Topological spin textures in electronic non-Hermitian systems (nagaosa, arXiv)

  18. 2312.00866 Sub-MeV Dark Matter Detection with Bilayer Graphene (arXiv)

  19. 2312.00652 Perspective on the Vortex Mass Determination in Superconductors using Circular Dichroism (arXiv)

  20. 2312.00187 Proximity effect of s-wave superconductor on inversion broken Weyl Semi-Metal (arXiv)

  21. 2312.00515 Carrier density crossover and quasiparticle mass enhancement in a doped 5$d$ Mott insulator (arXiv)

  22. 2312.00642 Interplay between Haldane and modified Haldane models in $\alpha$-$T_{3}$ lattice: Band structures, phase diagrams and edge states (arXiv)

  23. 2312.00636 Hyperdeterminants and Composite fermion States in Fractional Chern Insulators (arXiv)

  24. 2312.00222 Anomalous Hall effect with plateaus observed in a magnetic Weyl semimetal NdAlGe at low temperatures (arXiv)

  25. 2312.00147 Vacancies in generic Kitaev spin liquids (arXiv)

  26. 2312.00511 Weak Electronic Correlations Observed in Magnetic Weyl Semimetal Mn$_3$Ge (arXiv)

  27. 2312.00543 Longitudinal optical conductivity of graphene in van der Waals heterostructures composed of graphene and transition metal dichalcogenides (arXiv)

  28. 2312.00378 Magneto-transport in the monolayer MoS2 material system for high-performance field-effect transistor applications (arXiv)

  29. 2312.00440 Charge doping into spin minority states mediates doubling of $T_\mathrm{C}$ in ferromagnetic CrGeTe$_3$ (arXiv)
